parameters.name: assetIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the data asset.

parameters.name: configuration
parameters.description: The configuration of the asset filter. columnConfiguration (dict) --- The column configuration of the asset filter. includedColumnNames (list) --- Specifies whether to include column names. (string) --- rowConfiguration (dict) --- The row configuration of the asset filter. The row filter. and (list) --- The --and' clause of the row filter. (dict) --- The row filter. expression (dict) --- The expression of the row filter. equalTo (dict) --- The --equal to' clause of the row filter expression. The name of the column. The value that might be equal to an expression. greaterThan (dict) --- The --greater than' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might be greater than an expression. greaterThanOrEqualTo (dict) --- The --greater than or equal to' clause of the filter expression. The value that might be greater than or equal to an expression. in (dict) --- The --in' clause of the row filter expression. The values that might be in the expression. (string) --- isNotNull (dict) --- The --is not null' clause of the row filter expression. isNull (dict) --- The --is null' clause of the row filter expression. lessThan (dict) --- The --less than' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might be less than the expression. lessThanOrEqualTo (dict) --- The --less than or equal to' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might be less than or equal to an expression. like (dict) --- The --like' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might be like the expression. notEqualTo (dict) --- The --no equal to' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might not be equal to the expression. notIn (dict) --- The --not in' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might not be in the expression. (string) --- notLike (dict) --- The --not like' clause of the row filter expression. The value that might not be like the expression. or (list) --- The --or' clause of the row filter. sensitive (boolean) --- Specifies whether the row filter is sensitive.
